messages.message:
Brian
Exactly.  I have started writing down every "coincidence" that I notice, at the end of my life I will be able to prove how my reaction led to my success.  I can only prove it at the end with productivity, but practicing it helps me realize the opportunities now!

Brian
Exactly.  You're leveling up.  Doesn't matter if the story is true, only what you do with the information.
